name: Zombie War - Save The World
description:
A worldwide zombie outbreak erupts in several metropolitan areas around the world; those bitten by the creatures become zombies themselves within seconds. You need to do all you can to resist the walking dead and rescue as many survivors as possible.

FEATURES
- Zombie combat in 4 different map with 5 unique game modes
- Over 10 weapons
- 4 skills to improve your ability: HP, power, armor and speed
- Up to 6 types of zombies: quick, strong, remote attack and powerful boss
- Tons of missions
- You can earn extra coins by training
